name: long_stats_combine
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Adds columns from stats into longitudinal qdec table, using longitudinally processed results.

inputs.description: QDEC table file specifying the subjects and time points. File has first columns: fsid  fsid-base
inputs.name: QDEC Table File

inputs.description: The stats file, e.g. aseg.stats or lh.aparc.stats
inputs.name: Stats File

inputs.description: The stats measure (e.g. volume, thickness, mean, std)
inputs.name: Measure

inputs.description: Full path to FreeSurfer subjects directory
inputs.name: Subject Directory

inputs.description: File name of output long qdec table
inputs.name: Output QDEC Table

inputs.description: File name to output stacked stats table (all subjects, all time points)
inputs.name: Output Stats Table

inputs.description: File name of stacked stats table (same order as qdec), instead of using --stats and --meas
inputs.name: Input Stacked Stats Table

inputs.description: Use cross sectional results (for testing only)
inputs.name: Cross Sectional Flag

output-files.description: Stacked stats table for all subjects, all time points
output-files.name: Output Stacked Stats Table
